edu.ftdev.KeyInterceptor.KeyHook

    Package Description
    edu.ftdev

    • Uses of KeyInterceptor.KeyHook in edu.ftdev

      Methods in edu.ftdev that return KeyInterceptor.KeyHook 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      KeyInterceptor.KeyHook DrawingFrame.getKeyPressedHook(int keyEvent)
      Gets the key hook currently set to intercept the given key pressed event.
      KeyInterceptor.KeyHook DrawingFrame.getKeyReleasedHook(int keyEvent)
      Gets the key hook currently set to intercept the given key released event.
      KeyInterceptor.KeyHook DrawingFrame.getKeyTypedHook(int keyEvent)
      Gets the key hook currently set to intercept the given key typed event.
      KeyInterceptor.KeyHook DrawingFrame.setKeyPressedHook(int keyEvent, KeyInterceptor.KeyHook keyHook)
      Sets a key hook to be called when a given key is pressed.
      KeyInterceptor.KeyHook DrawingFrame.setKeyReleasedHook(int keyEvent, KeyInterceptor.KeyHook keyHook)
      Sets a key hook to be called when a given key is released.
      KeyInterceptor.KeyHook DrawingFrame.setKeyTypedHook(int keyEvent, KeyInterceptor.KeyHook keyHook)
      Sets a key hook to be called when a given key is typed.
      Methods in edu.ftdev with parameters of type KeyInterceptor.KeyHook 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      KeyInterceptor.KeyHook DrawingFrame.setKeyPressedHook(int keyEvent, KeyInterceptor.KeyHook keyHook)
      Sets a key hook to be called when a given key is pressed.
      KeyInterceptor.KeyHook DrawingFrame.setKeyReleasedHook(int keyEvent, KeyInterceptor.KeyHook keyHook)
      Sets a key hook to be called when a given key is released.
      KeyInterceptor.KeyHook DrawingFrame.setKeyTypedHook(int keyEvent, KeyInterceptor.KeyHook keyHook)
      Sets a key hook to be called when a given key is typed.
